locations.name: Bahen 1F
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. There is an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. You see something on the ground -- looks like a Phone? There is an exit from the building to the East.

locations.name: Library Study Room
locations.brief_description: You are in the library study room.
locations.long_description: You are in a quiet library study room, surrounded by neatly arranged desks and chairs. You found your USB Drive and Laptop Charger at one of the desks. Perfect! This is exactly what you needed to submit your project. There are exits to the East and West

locations.name: Starbucks
locations.long_description: You are inside a Starbucks outside the library. The coffee smells good, and you hear the faint sound of baristas calling out names for orders.

locations.name: Subway
locations.brief_description: You are in a Subway restaurant
locations.long_description: You are in a Subway restaurant. The sun is shining brightly outside, and a few students are walking in and out. You see your Lucky Mug at a table! There is an exit from the building to the North and South

locations.name: Lost and found
locations.brief_description: You are at the lost and found
locations.long_description: You are at the lost and found. This is where you can return lost items that you found.

locations.name: Convocation Hall
locations.long_description: You are at Convocation Hall. A class just ended and everyone is leaving the building. You notice a Wallet on the floor, someone must have dropped it. You pick it up, but this item is not required for your project. Returning it seems like the right thing to do.

locations.name: Dorm Room
locations.brief_description: You are at your dorm room! This is where you can submit your assignment.
locations.long_description: You are at your dorm room! This is where you can submit your assignment.

items.name: Phone
items.description: There is a Phone on the ground. Someone must have dropped it.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: There is a USB Drive at a desk. This is required for your project!

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: There is a Laptop Charger at a desk. This is required for your project!

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: There is a Lucky Mug at a desk. Something you cannot live without.

items.name: Wallet
items.description: There is a Wallet on the floor. Someone must have dropped it.
